Package guiLayer

Class PaletteArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • guiLayer.PaletteArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Constants
    public class PaletteArea
extends java.lang.Object
implements Constants
    PaletteArea, The paletteArea describes the palette where the user can pick blocks from.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    group17
